title: Anxiety
content:
There are also a range of support organisations. Some offer face-to-face meetings where you can talk about your difficulties and problems with other people. Many provide support and guidance over the phone or by email.
Ask your healthcare provider about local support groups for anxiety in your area or contact one of these[support groups](https://healthify.nz/support/a/anxiety-support "Anxiety").
####    
Apps reviewed by Healthify
You may find it useful to look at some [mental health and wellbeing apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/m/mental-health-and-wellbeing-apps).
####  How is an anxiety disorder treated? 
Anxiety disorders can be treated.
